plugin.name: Binja Architecture Reference
plugin.description: Binary Ninja plugin to display a cheat sheet with information about the current architecture
plugin.longdescription: This plugin renders an HTML cheat sheet about the current architecture using the information available in `bv.arch` and `bv.platform`
